channel.title: I need help with getting my server online
channel.description: im using no-ip.org for my server host and i have setup my hos, but now how do i get it online?[b][/b]

item.title: I need help with getting my server online
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

Listen carefully, i dont need co owner i got my own server at 87.52.93.24 but its okay ill help you…

  1. Get Hamachi at www.hamachi.cc
  2. Connect Hamachi
  3. Open No-ip DUC program on ur computer
  4. Click options, and then Connections…
  5. Check override automatic connection detection
  6. Check override automatic IP detection
  7. Set the (Adapter to use to connect No-Ip) Set it to (Hamachi network interface)
  8. Set the (IP to post updates) Set it to (Your internet)
  9. Click ok, Then check the servername u have in no-ip
  10. Copy the ip adress standing by (Updating to ip: internal [IP here])
  11. Get a source and click the runserver.bat
  12. Go to moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php or runelocus.com/status/
  13. click add server and put ur server name - ip - port - the password to edit - and description Now click add server

And it should be online -MatiasMunk

Hope it helped[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2008, 03:35:33 am[/size][hr]Did it helped?

Read full topic
